commentary: The fact that there are troll versions of our celebrities, starring in troll versions of our shows and movies, MIGHT seem like some really next-level degree of laziness and stupidity in the field of off-the-cuff worldbuilding. But maybe it bears further reflection? Are these figures really troll versions of our celebrities? Since Alternia  existed before Earth did, maybe our celebrities are just human versions of them? Maybe the Will Smith we know is better described as Human Troll Will Smith? Something for us all to meditate upon for many years to come.
